English: Very good barrier, love from Hatsune Miku.
Chinese: 非常好防护罩，爱来自初音ミク。
增加自己身上<color=#7FFFD4>未来之音</color>层数的攻击力。

English: Heal by stacks of "The Future Voice" at the end of turn. Remove 1 stack.
Chinese:
回合结束时，恢复等量于层数的体力。
那之后，消耗1层<color=#7FFFD4>未来之音</color>。

English: Welcome to my concert. Today's track is ...
Chinese: 「欢迎来到我的演唱会！今天的曲目，就从……」

English:
When battle starts, place 2 stacks of "The Future Voice" to all party members.

"The Future Voice": Heal by stacks of "The Future Voice" at the end of turn. Remove 1 stack.

Intensity X: Hatsune Miku will trigger additional effects on characters with X stacks of "The Future Voice".

Rhythm X: When there is X stacks of "The Future Voice" on Hatsune Miku, additional effects will be triggered.
Chinese: 最初之音 - 战斗开始时，为所有队友施加2层未来之音。 未来之音 - 回合结束时，恢复等量于层数的体力。那之后，消耗1层未来之音。 音弦X - 初音未来的技能对拥有身上已有X层未来之音的角色释放会触发额外效果。 音律X - 初音未来身上有X层未来之音时会触发额外效果。

English:
Continuously using singing to stack various gains,
The more gain, the stronger the therapeutic effect,
Push the battle to its climax with powerful sound!
Chinese:
不断使用歌声叠加各种增益，
增益越多治疗效果越强，
以强大的音感将战斗推向最高潮！

English: みくみくにしてあげる
Chinese: みくみくにしてあげる♪

English:
Remove a random debuff from all party members.
Place 2 stacks of "The Future Voice".
Give barrier by stacks of "The Future Voice".
Chinese:
解除1个负面状态。
施加等量与目标身上<color=#7FFFD4>未来之音</color>层数的防护罩。

English: Place &a stacks of "The Future Voice" to target.
Place "The Future Voice", until the stacks of "The Future Voice" on the field is the same.
Chinese: 施加<color=#7FFFD4>未来之音</color>，直到和场上拥有<color=#7FFFD4>未来之音</color>层数的角色层数相同为止。

English: アンノウン·マザーグース
Chinese: アンノウン・マザーグース

English:
Place 5 stacks of "The Future Voice" to target.
Intensity 12: Create 1 "アンノウン·マザーグース" in hand.
Chinese: <color=#54FF9F>音弦12</color> - 将1张“アンノウン・マザーグース”加入手卡。

English:
Remove all allies' debuffs.
Place 39 stacks of "The Future Voice".
Faint.
Chinese:
解除所有痛苦、弱化减益，施加39层<color=#7FFFD4>未来之音</color>。
那之后，自己死亡。

English:
No effect. When this skill in hand:
At the end of turn, place 2 stacks of "The Future Voice" to all party members.
Rhythm 3: Place 2 additional stacks.
Rhythm 9: Deal stacks of "The Future Voice" * &a damage to all enemies.
Chinese:
使用时没有效果。这个技能握在手中时：
每个回合结束时，为所有队友施加2层<color=#7FFFD4>未来之音</color>。
<color=#00FFFF>音律3</color> - 额外施加2层<color=#7FFFD4>未来之音</color>。
<color=#00FFFF>音律9</color> - 对所有敌人造成&a伤害(自身<color=#7FFFD4>未来之音</color>层数 x 治疗力的100%)。

English:
Heal the ally with the lowest health  by &a, place 1 stack of "The Future Voice" to target.
Rhythm 3: Overheal self by &b, place 1 stack of "The Future Voice" to self.
Rhythm 9: Recast it to random enemy.
Chinese:
为己方HP最低的角色治疗&a(治疗力的100%)，施加1层<color=#7FFFD4>未来之音</color>。

<color=#00FFFF>音律3</color> - 超额治疗自己100%，自身获得1层<color=#7FFFD4>未来之音</color>。
<color=#00FFFF>音律9</color> - 对随机敌人再次释放一次。

English:
Increase this skill's Critical Chance by 10% for every stacks of "The Future Voice" on Hatsune Miku. additional Crit Chance: &a
Rhythm 3: Deal &b additional damage.
Rhythm 9: Put this skill back to hand.
Chinese:
自己身上每有1层<color=#7FFFD4>未来之音</color>，暴击率提升10%。额外暴击率：%a

<color=#00FFFF>音律3</color> - 自己身上每有1层<color=#7FFFD4>未来之音</color>，额外造成1伤害。额外伤害：%b
<color=#00FFFF>音律9</color> - 将这张卡放回手卡中。

English:
When cast on an enemy, place 2 stacks of "The Future Voice" to self.
Rhythm 3: Deal &a additional damage.
Rhythm 9: Recast it.
Chinese:
每命中1个敌人，自身获得2层<color=#7FFFD4>未来之音</color>。

<color=#00FFFF>音律3</color> - 额外造成&a伤害(攻击力的35%)。
<color=#00FFFF>音律9</color> - 重复释放一次。

English:
Place 2 stacks of "The Future Voice" to target.
Intensity 4: Give &a barrier to target.
Chinese: <color=#54FF9F>音弦4</color> - 赋予目标&a保护罩(治疗力的80%)。

English:
Place 2 stacks of "The Future Voice" to target.
Place 1 stack of "恋は戦争" to all party members.
Intensity 4: Place 1 additional stack of "恋は戦争".
Chinese: <color=#54FF9F>音弦2</color> - 额外施加1层[恋は戦争]。

English:
View the discard pile, and select one skill to add to your hand, place same as skill's AP stacks of "The Futre Voice" to self.
Rhythm 3: Skill's AP - 1.
Rhythm 9: Skill's AP - 10.
Chinese:
从弃牌堆将1个技能加入手卡。
自己获得其费用相同的<color=#7FFFD4>未来之音</color>层数。

<color=#00FFFF>音律3</color> - 使那个技能费用降低1点。
<color=#00FFFF>音律9</color> - 使那个技能费用降低10点。
抽取1个技能。将2个[大葱]加入手卡。

English:
Draw 1.
Place 2 stacks of "The Future Voice" to target.
Chinese:
抽取1个技能。
<color=#54FF9F>音弦1</color> - 额外施加1层<color=#7FFFD4>未来之音</color>。
